original_title: Pope Leo XIV moves into papal apartment with four close friends at Vatican | Fox News
article_summary: Pope Leo XIV, an American pontiff, is breaking tradition by moving into a renovated papal apartment with four roommates, reflecting a community ethos. This is the first time in modern history a pope has lived communally in the palace's official quarters. The move is seen as a departure from Pope Francis, who chose a Vatican guesthouse over the papal apartments.</s>
